short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Type text, record, or load text file, and choose from different voices in sound, pitch and speed, with an option to download.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension is a text to speech tool. The user can choose from various voices , speed and pitch. The user can upload the text file as an attachment, make modifications and listen to the text. There are options to play, pause, resume, and stop the speech.  The play button is also used to record the text. There is also a button to download the audio file in .wav format. You can play .wav format in VLC Player. 
Note:- To download the audio file, you have to play/record the entire portion of the text you want to download.
